remarks: The value of a function with one of its ordered pairs replaced, at the replaced ordered pair.  See also ~ fvsnun2 .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2007.)
statement:
fvsnun.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
fvsnun.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
fvsnun.3 $e |- G = ( { <. A , B >. } u. ( F |` ( C \ { A } ) ) ) $.
fvsnun1 $p |- ( G ` A ) = B $.
